sourcesContent:
import "./testimonials.scss"; export default function Testimonials() { const data = [ { id: 1, name: "Victor Angel Dimayuga", title: "Senior Developer", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/1680172/pexels-photo-1680172.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/twitter.png", desc: "Me dio mucho gusto trabajar en conjunto para el crecimiento de la empresa.", }, { id: 2, name: "Griselda Sandoval Canon", title: "Senior Developer DevOps", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/428321/pexels-photo-428321.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/youtube.png", desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Placeat magnam dolorem recusandae perspiciatis ducimus vel hic temporibus. ", featured: true, }, { id: 3, name: "Guillaermo Figueroa", title: "Ing Civil de Obra", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/3863793/pexels-photo-3863793.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/linkedin.png", desc: "Trabajmos juntos en Obras arquitectonicas de tomas de agua.", }, ]; return (

Testimonials

{data.map((d) => (
{d.desc}

{d.name}

{d.title}

))}
); }
